<tool>

Content Model

( #PCDATA | foreign | material | material_format | plant | tool )*

May Contain:

  • PCDATA
  • <foreign>
  • <material>
  • <material_format>
  • <plant>
  • <tool>

May be contained in:

  • <block>
  • <heading>
  • <item>
  • <margin-block>
  • <purpose>
  • <sub_recipe>
  • <tool>
  • <unit>
